description: Fixed Lindgren's solo fingering and some acoustic parts. Also some other things I missed. I cannot fix the other two with TuxGuitar's UI, so I need a saviour to come and rescue me there.
title: Deliverance

description:
What I fixed:
- Fixed Akerfeldt's intro, bits of his solo, and his ending part. 
- Fixed Lindgren's ending parts too. 
- Both aforementioned parts had the ending riff altered slightly and the chorus riff edited also. 
- Fixed Mendez's soft interlude bass part and his ending part. 
- Akerfeldt's solo rhythm/backing track was also fixed. 
- I also gave the drums a face-lift and tune-up as well.
title: Deliverance

description: *sigh* maybe it will work this time
title: Deliverance

description:
- Rewrote entire tab with halved tempo
- Improved the main guitar riff using a lesson found on YouTube
- Rearranged guitar tracks as appropriate
- Added piano and clean guitar tracks
- Added twelve-string effect
- Made other minor improvements
- Rewrote drums
title: Deliverance
